job_title: Senior IBM Websphere Commerce Server (WCS) Developer
jd:
Role :: Senior IBM Websphere Commerce Server (WCS) Developer
Location: Issaquah WA 98027
- Onsite role, 5 days a week
Duration: Long term

Job Details:
Must Have Skills
• IBM WebSphere Commerce Server
• Java
• DB2

Detailed Job Description
• Develop ecom applications in IBM WCS. Coding, designing, debugging in WCS. Client communication.
• Strong system debugging/troubleshooting skills
• Developing/deploying web applications or services using JSP, jQuery, JavaScript, WebSphere Commerce or Java frameworks.
• Distributed cache technologies such as Redis
• Search technologies such as Lucid works, Apache Solr
• Regularly review SOLR configuration details and maintain
• Support the upgrade plan for SOLR application and its Maintenance of Servers
• Support the indexing activities of data
• Searching for specific products on requirement support
• Support of server level patching, batch jobs and backups
• Queuing technologies such as IBM MQ. MSMQ
• Assign the users and groups to the requested roles and ensure security context that is used when an allowed operation is attempted.
